metadata.title: CVE-2020-26559 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description: Bluetooth Mesh Provisioning in the Bluetooth Mesh profile 1.0 and 1.0.1 maypermit a nearby device (participating in the provisioning protocol) toidentify the AuthValue used given the Provisionerâ€™s public key, and theconfirmation number and nonce provided by the provisioning device. Thiscould permit a device without the AuthValue to complete provisioningwithout brute-forcing the AuthValue.

criterions.comment: linux package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.

linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support, was needs-triage').
